page.title: 06PROSPECT FARM (Cont.)
page.content: He used to keep livestock but they were too exspensive to feed. The farm is 485 years old and was far bigger when it was first founded. Mr Machin has gradually bought in some of the original land but feels that the farm is now big enough for him.He owns 530 acres of working land and 6 acres of woodland. Mr Machin has two dogs and three cats he also owns a tennis court. In addition to allowing storage for farm machinery on his premises, he allows a firm called Agrochemicals to trade in one of his buildings. The firm supplies farming chemicals to local farmers.
